alert.note: Alert for Banks; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Banks and northeastern Jackson Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1018 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms with very heavy rain was along a line extending from Homer to near Commerce, and moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Commerce, Maysville, and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
